resources.string: Ops, Just Read It crashed. Send a report to make me investigate!
Notifies a crash and generates a report that can be sent to the developer

This app was developed under GNU GPL 3.0.
The whole source code can be seen at
https://github.com/backsofangels/justreadit

The libraries Zxing, Zxing-android-embedded and Realm-java have been used.

For every question or feedback, mail me to
backsofangels@gmail.com
